bug.author: azhavoro
bug.summary: RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded
bug.description: Scenario: Client has big number of collected logs (about 100k+) and try to save job. Error: RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded Line : super(...items) in LogCollection constructor Call stack: at new LogCollection at LoggerHandler.getLogs at Object.getLogs at saveAnnotation at HTMLButtonElement.$.on at HTMLButtonElement.dispatch at HTMLButtonElement.elemData.handle
